references.paper_title: Calibrating noise to sensitivity in private data analysis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of differential privacy, introducing the concept of calibrating noise to sensitivity for privacy protection.

references.paper_title: The algorithmic foundations of differential privacy
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of the algorithmic aspects of differential privacy, establishing it as a standard framework for privacy-preserving data analysis.

references.paper_title: Instance-optimal mean estimation under differential privacy
references.reason: This paper significantly advances the understanding of optimal mean estimation under differential privacy, providing instance-optimal algorithms and error bounds.
